contents:
Do you hear the people worship?
worshiping an elder of angry?
It is the music about one who never die again
When it hitting in your heart
Echoes the poetry-canon from the choir
There is a life about to devote
When the fans comes
Will you join in our life-devoting group
Who will be zuosi with me?
In the red shirt
Is there a life you long to give?
Then join in the mohu
That will give you the knowledge level to be raise
